name: Ah-Hoy!
description:
Visual Novel in which you can interact with a chaotic crew of pirates! This is my first ever attempt at a visual novel / dating sim, so it is definitely a learning experience with lots of trial and error! I'm hoping for some solid feedback on what I have so far. This is only a snippet of what I have plan, and hope to have stories for each character in which you can choose from.

Music is placed in as placeholders until I can work with my composer.

So, give it a go, and feel free to give your thoughts.
